people_also_ask.heading: Good news! Nearly two decades after its 1998 release, StarCraft is now free. ... Blizzard has just released the original game — plus the Brood War expansion — for free for both PC and Mac.18-Apr-2017
people_also_ask.title: StarCraft is now free, nearly 20 years after its release

people_also_ask.heading: StarCraft II has actually been free to play since all the way back in November of 2017. Players get quite a bit of game for the price of zero dollars, too, which includes full access to multiplayer, the first campaign, and a handful of co-op characters.21-May-2021
people_also_ask.title: StarCraft II: 10 Reasons Why It's Still Worth Playing Today

people_also_ask.heading: The StarCraft team is freeing themselves to 'think about what's next. ' Blizzard is looking to wind down further development on real-time strategy game StarCraft 2.18-Oct-2020
people_also_ask.title: Blizzard Is Officially Ending Development on 'StarCraft 2'

people_also_ask.heading: Currently, there's no starcraft 3 gameplay available as the game is far away from the release. You can find many gameplays on youtube claiming “starcraft 3 gameplay”, but all of them are not real or they are Starcraft 2.24-Jul-2021
